text: Music GameStop has just reported its earnings so it's time to take a look see what's going on how things are going and as you can see we closed at 2693 and right now we're trading in the low 28s now so we've up ticked a little bit because right after the release this actually down ticked not too insignificantly but as the news is being digested it definitely is starting to tick back up so let's see what's going on on now there were a couple changes and adjustments in the reporting period as a lot of people forecasted the options markets told that we kind of knew that that was coming so they decided to move to today after the close and we can see overall the company has done pretty well so let's talk about it so net sales were at 0.86 billion compared to 1.78 billion for the prior year third quarter so this is one of the marks against it to a degree we did see overall sales come down a little bit selling General and administrative sgna expenses 282 million for the period compared to 296 that's kind of what you would expect that that will e and flow depending on what's going on in the back end we really care about stuff like this net income 17.4 million compared to the net loss of 3.1 million for the prior year quarter this has a lot to do with the cash horde that they're
